description: Removes the specified recommendations from the specified assistant's queue of newly available recommendations. You can use this API in conjunction with GetRecommendations and a waitTimeSeconds input for long-polling behavior and avoiding duplicate recommendations.

parameters.name: assistantId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Wisdom assistant. Can be either the ID or the ARN. URLs cannot contain the ARN.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description: The identifier of the session. Can be either the ID or the ARN. URLs cannot contain the ARN.

nested_items.name: errors
nested_items.description: The identifiers of recommendations that are causing errors.

nested_items.name: message
nested_items.description: A recommendation is causing an error.

nested_items.name: recommendationId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the recommendation that is in error.
